Under the guidance of the UAE's President, 2016 will be the Year of Reading in the UAE. No nation, people or country increases without reading.
We have a literacy crisis in the Arab World and changing course to knowledge-based development means getting our youth reading.
Our goal is for the UAE to be a beacon of science and knowledge, as Andalusia, Granada, Baghdad and others were sources of enlightenment.

I received with sadness the news of the death of Marília Pêra, one of the most talented artists in the country, who dedicated her life to art.
Besides performing, Marília sang, danced, directed and produced, always enchanting the Brazilians, on television, in the movies and in the theater.
To my friends, family and Brazil, my feelings for the loss of this great actress.
